yoast_meta.yoast_wpseo_metadesc: This is a sample meta description. The site relies on these to function as intended. Please keep these up to date.

childWordPressAcfSimpleCopy.heading: Peace and empowerment grow here
childWordPressAcfSimpleCopy.copy: In caring for a garden of their own creation, students learn to care for themselves, each other and the world around them.

counter_1.heading: tons of food
counter_1.description: 13.5 lbs of food produced per family food farm each month

counter_2.heading: real change
counter_2.description: We serve over 2,500 people across Tulsa with during school, after school and summer programs.

counter_3.heading: sites to be seen
counter_3.description: changing thousands of lives at five sites throughout Tulsa.
